Text.Page: Don A. Tion has lost everything while playing dice games with Demoros. However, Don does not want to give up yet. He constantly begs generous adventurers for a Gold Ticket to get back in the game.

Perhaps that man over there knows something about this place.
Let's go and ask what happened here.

Hello! Yes, you! Do you have time... and money perhaps?

I don't know what got into me! That demon must have hypnotized me, and forced me to spend all our savings!

Oh, please, just one Gold Ticket. I'm a poor man, who just wants to see his children.
OK... Last chance. One win, and I'm outta here.
Please!!! I beg you. My children are waiting for me!

Please, just one ticket will be enough, thank you.

One more game and this can become a fortune...
